name: Add canceled MakePlans bookings to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as new rows
description: Every time a booking is canceled on MakePlans, Make will automatically add that booking's info to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MRrpzP2oI4Us550piSNChYicXxp6RXxxp54V6JhBh4M/edit?usp=sharing).
